rationale: The MD5 hash algorithm is cryptographically weak and susceptible to collision attacks. This patch replaces the insecure MD5 algorithm with SHA256, a more secure and recommended hashing algorithm, to ensure the integrity of the generated signature.
patch:
--- a/app.py
+++ b/app.py
@@ -153,7 +153,7 @@
 todo = Todo(title=title, complete=False)
 db.session.add(todo)
 db.session.commit()
- sig = hashlib.md5(title.encode()).hexdigest()
+ sig = hashlib.sha256(title.encode()).hexdigest()
 print(f"Storing signature for todo {todo.id}: {sig}")
 
 return jsonify({
